creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: large black bird facing R, with beak open; perched on gnarled, snow covered branch rising vertically from bottom center; flecks of white paint
marks: Signature and Seals center L edge: [Garakusuke Ganku- sha]
title: Raven and old Tree in Snow
